name: Honeycomb (Jeremy K)
description:
Honeycomb is a cute and short platformer where you play as a bee and explore its beehive.

Jump over pits, climb up sticky walls, and hover over spike pits to reach the exit at the end of each stage!

Controls:

Move - Left/Right Arrow Keys

Jump - Spacebar

Select - Enter

Pause - P

Restart - R

All art, programming, game design, and sound effects were made by me.

The song used is "8 Bit Town" by HeatleyBros.

This is the first fully finished game that I've created/published. Follow my Itch page to support my game development journey!
